attributes.action: Get funding to continue 'Time to Change' social movement for Mental Health
attributes.additional_details: Give funding to continue the crucial work that Time to change complete. As champions we have made a huge impact on changing people's perceptions with regards to Mental Health. If we lose this now we will lose the momentum and all the great work that has been done so far. The Government CAN make a difference by supporting this social movement. If you want to make a difference in this world then help Time to change
attributes.background: Time to change is ending in March 2021. I speak for the champions we need extra funding to continue with this vital social movement to make a difference in reducing the stigma and discrimination we all face with regards to Mental health. This is massive and we need help to continue the crucial work
